subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: For much of the Rangers’ season, they have relied almost exclusively on Jaromir Jagr’s line for their scoring. During games like Wednesday night’s, when Jagr’s line is shut down, the Rangers struggle to score.
snippet: For much of the Rangers’ season, they have relied almost exclusively on Jaromir Jagr’s line for their scoring. During games like Wednesday night’s, when Jagr’s line is shut down, the Rangers struggle to score.
